item.title: PalistApp
item.description:
A platform for tracking results, races, and competitors in Spanish canoeing/kayaking events.

Status: Active development (since May 2024) · palistapp.com

What it is

PalistApp centralizes Spanish canoeing data: competition results, athlete profiles, and race calendars. Before PalistApp, this information was scattered and hard to access.

Tech stack

  • Data: Scraping + manual cleaning and validation
  • Database: PostgreSQL
  • Backend: Go API (low latency)
  • Frontend: React/TypeScript + Vite

Numbers

  • ~100,000 requests processed in 4 days

My biggest project to date.

item.title: About me
item.description:
TL;DR

I’m a student passionate about programming, mathematics, AI and computers, but above all I love learning and I enjoy building things.

In my free time, I like kayaking.

Best with: Python 3 · SQL · Linux · Data Structures · Algorithms

Familiar with: AI / ML · MongoDB · C · React/TypeScript

On the Water

I am a kayaker. I also serve as a certified canoeing referee. The discipline, persistence, and fairness I practice on the water are the same values I bring to my work.
